thread.title: Nokia Launches Nokia 3310 Reboot, Nokia 6, Nokia 5, Nokia 3 With Many More Exciting Features
thread.title_full: Nokia Launches Nokia 3310 Reboot, Nokia 6, Nokia 5, Nokia 3 With Many More Exciting Features

author: Savreen Chawla
title: Nokia Launches Nokia 3310 Reboot, Nokia 6, Nokia 5, Nokia 3 With Many More Exciting Features
text:
0 Feeds favorite favorite_border IN Science & Technology ON 26 Feb, 2017 Nokia Launches Nokia 3310 Reboot, Nokia 6, Nokia 5, Nokia 3 With Many More Exciting Features Share on twitter Follow Us On 
After a long wait for Nokia, the world's eyes were set on the Nokia MWC 2017 event, where as many as four new handsets of Nokia are launched. Although affordable Android smartphones Nokia 6, Nokia 5 and Nokia 3 were the flagship, the main attraction of the evening was pulled towards the Nokia 3310 reboot, bringing us the memories of the early 2000s. Nokia Launches Nokia 3310 Reboot, Nokia 6, Nokia 5, Nokia 3 With Many More Exciting Features 754 396 
That the Nokia Android phones will be defined by great cameras, amazing design and premium build quality. He also added that the premium design should not be limited just to high-end smartphones. Nokia 6 has a star appearance. via 
Nokia 6 which is available only in China at present, has now finally become available globally at EUR 229 (roughly Rs. 16,000). 
Pricing at EUR 299 (roughly Rs. 21,000), the company also announced an all-new Nokia 6 Arc Black variant which will sport high-class piano black colour. via 
The phone comes with basic features of multimedia and phone roots running the Series 30+ user interface. It will have swappable faceplates in multiple colours. The design is said to weigh a little less, become a little slimmer and remain similar to the original. It is expected to have a slightly bigger screen with a change in physical alphanumeric keyboard's key size and key structure. Positioning at EUR 59 (roughly Rs. 4,000), it will be a secondary phone for the nostalgic Nokia fans. 
Nokia 3310 reboot now has a standby time of 1 month, talk time of 22 hours and will come with the classic Nokia ringtone that everyone remembers along with the preloaded Snake game.
